massim.webclient

Class WebClientTournamentServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • massim.webclient.WebClientServletAbstract
          • massim.webclient.WebClientTournamentServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class WebClientTournamentServlet
extends WebClientServletAbstract
    This class is used to display tournament-statistics received as xml-document via rmi-service and transformed with xslt-stylesheet.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • doGet

        public void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
           throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                  IOException
        This method answers all client requests. The tournament-statistics will be sent to the client via HttpServletResponse or in case of an exception an error-message is sent.
        Specified by:
        doGet in class WebClientServletAbstract
        Parameters:
        request - the request from the client-side
        response - the response from the servlet to the client

        javax.servlet.ServletException
